system.description: When you support another family with resources or assistance, roll +Treaty (the strength of your relationship with them).

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your aid is insufficient or unwelcome. You strain the relationship and may create resentment or obligations.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your aid helps them, but choose one: it costs you more than expected, they become dependent on your support, or other families notice and react.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your aid strengthens them and your relationship. Both families benefit from the cooperation.
